Description:
The cube's joint dataset doesn't work and lead the exception when preview the crosstab[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070530-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, Open the attached report design
2, Check the joint key in cube
3, Preview

Expected result:
Preview successfully

Actual result:
May be some invalid value will lead the generate fact table failed, exception occurs

Error log:
TabularCube Customer Cube1: 
- The row "ANG Resellers 237 0.0 " have no valid dimension information for dimension: Group3. 
The row "ANG Resellers 237 0.0 " have no valid dimension information for dimension: Group3. ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: The row "ANG Resellers 237 0.0 " have no valid dimension information for dimension: Group3. at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.adapter.impl.DataRequestSessionImpl.defineCube(DataRequestSessionImpl.java:484) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.AbstractDataEngine.prepare(AbstractDataEngine.java:124) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:94) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.wrap.WrappedReportExecutor.execute(WrappedReportExecutor.java:59) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.dup.SuppressDuplciateReportExecutor.execute(SuppressDuplciateReportExecutor.java:50) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.wrap.WrappedReportExecutor.execute(WrappedReportExecutor.java:59) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.doRun(RunAndRenderTask.java:146) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:71) at org.eclipse.birt.report.service.ReportEngineService.runAndRenderReport(Unknown Source)

Created an attachment (id=69218)
attached design file
The CUSTUMNERNUMBER of row "ANG Resellers 237 0.0 " is 237 which does not exist in dimension "Group3". So the exception is thrown. This is not a bug.
